name: Stranded On Ice (Nothing, Solracsz)
description:
You have been stranded on ice in the middle of the sea with no one around. Well.. there are people, they just don't seem to like you very much. Battle the vicious animals that want to take over your land and remember to keep yourself afloat. Controls (you can rebind though): ActionsControlsMoveWASD
⬆️⬇️⬅️➡️Melee AttackLeft Mouse ButtonRange AttackRight Mouse ButtonPause/Options MenuP Credits:

Code: Bix Men (Nothing#3367)
Art: Solracsz @solracssz
Audio: Tucker Hux Murray
